EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-Partner-Teleprospecting-IDG teleprospect-T001XB.d.Email - EN1
EmailTemplate.subject: Redefining private optical networks for the enterprise
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Redefining private optical networks for the enterprise Your enterprise can benefit from its own secure private optical network today!
Satisfy your enterprise’s growing bandwidth needs with a private optical network solution from Nokia. Watch our video to learn how we are redefining private optical networks for the enterprise, making them simpler, easier and less costly to implement. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
